title: Topic 001 Question 045
body: You are building an Azure Synapse Analytics dedicated SQL pool that will contain a fact table for transactions from the first half of the year 2020.
You need to ensure that the table meets the following requirements:
✑ Minimizes the processing time to delete data that is older than 10 years
✑ Minimizes the I/O for queries that use year-to-date values
How should you complete the Transact-SQL statement? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
